Damn straight. We never see coverage of Bernie Sanders, who is generating large crowds without cheer leading by CNN. They and to be fair most other networks have come like a pack of school kids anxiously repeating what the bully has to say to the victim he/she has targeted.
The only reason that cars are selling well is that Saudi Arabia is pumping oil at historic rates, Obama shouldn't be taking credit even less with his stupid administration.

The issue is not WHO is running. The issue is are WE going to become and remain vigilant citizens who prioritize our politics and culture and rights, over television and instant gratification? It's up to us, why aren't you doing articles on voting and the lack there of, and the low numbers that turn out? Why aren't you doing stories on the need to be involved all the time, and to demand accountability from all elected officials?
